class_notes:
(Same as NBB 370 3)
Freshmen are not allowed to take this class.  Prior completion of PSYC 110, 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology or NBB intro courses equivalent.
course_description: Research and theory concerning the way information about the world is acquired and remembered.
